content: Yes, here is the new report we have been working on: https://notes.ethereum.org/@poemm/evm384-update5

author: ralexstokes
content: does anyone have a rough estimate for gas costs of a pairing check under EIP-2537?

author: ralexstokes
content: if i'm reading this correctly, for a single pairing: from EIP-2537: 108k gas, under the schedule in this document (v7_modelb): 421k gas

author: ralexstokes
content: but possibly with great savings if we deploy opcode repricing
